name: FarmBot
description:
FarmBot - Automated Yield Farming Strategy Agent

Your intelligent farming companion that manages complex yield farming
strategies 24/7, optimizing compounding, rebalancing, and gas costs
automatically.

ðŸŽ¯ What FarmBot Does:
- Automates yield farming across 200+ protocols (Convex, Aura, Curve,
  Balancer, Stargate, Pendle, Yearn, Lido, etc.)
- Executes auto-compounding strategies (reinvests rewards instantly)
- Optimizes gas costs (only compounds when profitable)
- Rebalances farms based on APY changes
- Harvests multiple reward tokens efficiently
- Manages liquidity position sizing
- Executes exit strategies when APY falls below thresholds

ðŸ’° Why FarmBot Pays For Itself:
- Auto-compounding adds 8-15% extra APY via frequency
- Gas optimization saves $1,200-3,000/year (typical user)
- Identifies when to move to better yields (saves missed opportunities)
- Prevents farming bad yields (exits before collapse)
- Handles complex multi-leg strategies you'd never do manually
